ComicInfo.Summary:
The Iron Dwarfs: The Robinsons are captured by small aliens with high specific gravity -- the iron dwarfs. They are rescued by planet Lacare's original inhabitants, who are at war with the invading iron dwarfs. The iron dwarfs send the space station toward a giant sun, but the friendly Lacareans retrieve it with help from Tam and Tim. The Robinsons resume their long journey home.
The Jaws of Death: Jana guides Rex and Scotty on a dangerous journey to an undersea farming base, where they hope to find help.
ComicInfo.Tags: Space,Craig Robinson,Scotty MacKay,June Robinson,Tim Robinson,Tam Robinson,Captain Venture
ComicInfo.Title: The Iron Dwarfs; The Jaws of Death
ComicInfo.Writer: Gaylord DuBois,Gaylord Du Bois,Gaylord Du Bois
